page.title: 02Pimperne Village Survey
page.content: We held a survey in the village.We sent out 200 forms and had nearly three quarters returned. From the forms we had back we saw that 80% of people who now live in Pimperne have lived here less than 20 years. Almost everyone likes living here,they said it is quiet,a good convenient position,healthy,friendly.Two people said it was too quiet,two more said they were lonely.Most have cars and about a third go to village clubs or associations. About 14% go to church regularly,41% said they go occasionally.
